Audio Description: On a bright yellow background a man with a determined expression looks directly at the viewer, from this World War II recruitment poster. The brown-haired, blue-eyed man is wearing a black knit cap, brown coat with the collar up and the zipper open to reveal his blue turtleneck sweater. There is a small round button on the left side of his jacket. His right hand is gripping the brown wooden wheel of a ship. Above him in red letters are the words “Let’s finish the job!” on a yellow band below him in red and black letters are the words “Urgent, experienced seamen needed! Wire collect: merchant Marine, Washington, DC, or inquire your maritime Union or US Employment Service.”
Creator: United States. Maritime Commission
